frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-dash-from-panel
frozen.shortDescription: Top dock for GNOME 40+. Hover top panel and GNOME Shell dash appears without overview.
frozen.longDescription:
Top dock for GNOME 40+. Hover top panel and GNOME Shell dash appears without overview.

 Does use native GNOME Shell Dash. Very light extension.

 Please report bugs through GitHub.
